remarks: The analogue of the T_1 axiom (singletons are closed) for an R_0 space. In an R_0 space the set of all points topologically indistinguishable from ` A ` is closed.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
kqval.2 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) $.
r0cld $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ ( KQ ` J ) e. Fre /\ A e. X ) -> { z e. X | A. o e. J ( z e. o <-> A e. o ) } e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
$d A o x y z $.
$d F o z $.
$d J o x y z $.
$d X o x y z $.
